text: Hessa gish hankko Yseussa kaallizayti Toomassa “Nu Goda beeydooskko” gida. Toomassay qass “Miismmaren cadeetida iza kushshista ta ta ayfeera beeyoontta dahshene qasseka ta birdhdhe miismmarey gelidason gelitha xeelontta dashshene ta kushshe iza miiye maddunththan gelththa xeelontta dashshe ammanikke” gides.
